verbs.description: [V: According] to the latest figures by the federal government , ICE immigrant arrests are up significantly since Trump took office , while border arrests are down .

[ARGM-ADV: According to the latest figures by the federal government] , [ARG1: ICE immigrant arrests] [V: are] [ARG2: up] [ARGM-MNR: significantly] [ARGM-TMP: since Trump took office] , [ARGM-ADV: while border arrests are down] .
According to the latest figures by the federal government , ICE immigrant arrests are up significantly since [ARG0: Trump] [V: took] [ARG1: office] , while border arrests are down .
According to the latest figures by the federal government , ICE immigrant arrests are up significantly since Trump took office , while [ARG1: border arrests] [V: are] [ARG2: down] .
